meanings.definition: A type of light pastry dough used to make cream puffs and éclairs.
meanings.sent1: I learned how to make choux for the first time in my baking class.
meanings.sent2: The baker filled the choux with delicious cream for the dessert.
meanings.sent3: The choux dough looked like fluffy clouds ready to be baked.
meanings.sent4: Her choux pastry was as light as a feather, melting in your mouth.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked choux filled the kitchen with sweetness.

meanings.definition: A type of cabbage with a tightly packed head of leaves.
meanings.sent1: The farmer harvested a big choux from his cabbage patch.
meanings.sent2: The choux in the garden was so big, it needed two hands to carry.
meanings.sent3: The choux cabbage stood proudly among the other vegetables.
meanings.sent4: The choux leaves were tightly wrapped, protecting the heart of the cabbage.
meanings.sent5: The green choux looked like a giant ball of leaves in the field.
